name: PHAssetCollectionChangeRequest
desc: A request to create, delete, or modify a Photos asset collection, for use in a photo library change block.

items.name: class func creationRequestForAssetCollection(withTitle: String) -> Self
items.desc: Creates a request for adding a new asset collection to the Photos library.

items.name: var placeholderForCreatedAssetCollection: PHObjectPlaceholder
items.desc: A placeholder object for the asset collection that the change request creates.

items.name: class func deleteAssetCollections(NSFastEnumeration)
items.desc: Requests that the specified asset collections be deleted.

items.name: init?(for: PHAssetCollection)
items.desc: Creates a request for modifying the specified asset collection.

items.name: init?(for: PHAssetCollection, assets: PHFetchResult<PHAsset>)
items.desc: Creates a request for modifying the specified asset collection, with a fetch result for tracking changes.

items.name: var title: String
items.desc: The displayed name of the asset collection.

items.name: func addAssets(NSFastEnumeration)
items.desc: Adds the specified assets to the asset collection.

items.name: func insertAssets(NSFastEnumeration, at: IndexSet)
items.desc: Inserts the specified assets into the collection at the specified indexes.

items.name: func removeAssets(NSFastEnumeration)
items.desc: Removes the specified assets from the asset collection.

items.name: func removeAssets(at: IndexSet)
items.desc: Removes the assets at the specified indexes from the asset collection.

items.name: func replaceAssets(at: IndexSet, withAssets: NSFastEnumeration)
items.desc: Replaces the assets at the specified indexes in the asset collection with the specified assets.

items.name: func moveAssets(at: IndexSet, to: Int)
items.desc: Moves the assets at the specified indexes in the asset collection to a new index.
